pullrequest.title: Use internal urdf when we can't find it externally.

content.raw:
Hey Jose,
     So, I actually don't have a strong feeling either way on this one.  In some ways, I like automatically falling back, as there is more chance for success.  On the other hand, I definitely see your point, and we might do something that the user really didn't want.  I think others will have to weigh in on how they feel on that point.
     In the meantime, I think we can go along and also patch the buildfarm.  Since we would prefer to use the external copy of URDF, we can setup the buildfarm to do that, and then we can iterate on SearchForStuff.cmake to make changes as we see fit.  Does that make sense?
content.html: Hey Jose, So, I actually don't have a strong feeling either way on this one. In some ways, I like automatically falling back, as there is more chance for success. On the other hand, I definitely see your point, and we might do something that the user really didn't want. I think others will have to weigh in on how they feel on that point. In the meantime, I think we can go along and also patch the buildfarm. Since we would prefer to use the external copy of URDF, we can setup the buildfarm to do that, and then we can iterate on SearchForStuff.cmake to make changes as we see fit. Does that make sense?
